nodes.bodyText: Not sure why the KEY indirection is needed. I'd use STREAM_PROCESSING_DISABLE directly.

nodes.bodyText: disable -> disabled. But we have only one example of system prop about disabling: nuxeo.vcs.fulltext.disabled and nuxeo.vcs.fulltext.search.disabled. So it would be better to inverse the logic and use an enabled prop, as we have tons of those.
